item.title: The information characteristics of YouTube tourism content and their impacts on user satisfaction and intention to visit and share information: the moderating role of word-of-mouth information acceptance
item.description:
This paper examines how tourists adjust their spending based on relative satisfaction, identifying patterns of loss aversion across different travel purposes.

  • Published in Tourism Economics
  • Used a pseudo-panel dataset (2007â€“2023)
  • Applied fixed effects with Driscollâ€“Kraay standard errors
